messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Hajimemashite
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome, and hello from Kyoto. I am so incredibly tired after touring today, but I managed to get a good amount of Shinsengumi stuff, including a banner and a
messages.messageBody:
Welcome, and hello from Kyoto.

I am so incredibly tired after touring today, but I managed to get a good
amount of Shinsengumi stuff, including a banner and a figurine of Kondo
Isami.

The Okita Soji lighters were really cool looking, but I didn't get one.
Maybe next time...

-M.

messages.subject: Hajimemashite
messages.msgSnippet: So here I am, new fan.  I love the Shinsengumi and have ever since I first saw Rurouni Kenshin--any version of them is fine by me, but I like Kaze Hikaru and
messages.messageBody:
So here I am, new fan. I love the Shinsengumi and have ever since I
first saw Rurouni Kenshin--any version of them is fine by me, but I
like Kaze Hikaru and the NHK Shinsengumi a lot . . . anyway, hi there
everyone! Okita Souji is the best!
